experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.summary: Lead engineer driving micro frontend architecture and new UX implementation for the Lowes Returns Android app.
bullets: Lead the adoption of a micro frontend architecture for the Lowes Returns Android app to improve scalability and developer velocity.
Implement new user experiences in React, Ionic, and Capacitor for the Lowes Returns Android app used by sales floor associates.

experiences.title: Front End Engineer
experiences.summary: Implemented and launched React experiences for the AWS IAM Console and supported production through on-call operations.
bullets: Led implementation and launch of new React user experiences on the AWS Identity and Access Management Console, impacting thousands of customers, and monitored and remediated incoming customer issues.
Participated in monthly on-call rotation for the IAM console, resolving customer and operational issues and presenting weekly status to the broader Identity team.
Wrote extensive unit and integration tests using React Testing Library, Enzyme, and Cypress.
Voluntarily left role, not affected by layoffs, to relocate closer to family in Chicago, IL.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.summary: Contributed front-end features and tests to a Dart + React web application within an Agile team.
bullets: Developed front-end features for a Dart + React based web application, Wdesk.
Implemented an improved modal to manage XBRL profiles in Wdesk.
Worked with Agile development methodologies, participated in code reviews, and wrote unit and functional tests.

experiences.title: Web Software Developer Intern
experiences.summary: Built and containerized a full-stack discrepancy logger application for NPR Audio Engineering.
bullets: Developed an Audio Engineering discrepancy logger web application using the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, Node.js) as the sole developer.
Containerized the application with Docker for CI/CD.
Used Jira and other project management tools for task tracking and collaboration.

education.summary: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering with a 3.01 GPA.

awards.title: Technical Education Senior Award
awards.summary: Awarded for outstanding work and dedication in the area of Technical Education.
bullets: Awarded to students who exhibited outstanding work and dedication in the area of Technical Education.

awards.title: WSC Logo Design
awards.summary: Won first place in a logo design competition hosted by the Wheaton Sport Center in Wheaton, IL.
bullets: Won 1st place prize of $1,000 for a logo design competition hosted by the Wheaton Sport Center in Wheaton, IL.

skills.name: Personal Projects
skills.summary: Full stack web and native mobile applications incorporating machine learning and AI.
